s = input()

if s == s[::-1] and s[0:int((len(s)-1)/2)] == s[0:int((len(s)-1)/2)][::-1] and s[int((len(s)+3)/2)-1:] == s[int((len(s)+3)/2)-1:][::-1] and s[0:int((len(s)-1)/2)] == s[0:int((len(s)-1)/2)][::-1]:
    print('Yes')
else:
    print('No')

s = input()

print("Yes" if s == s[::-1] and s[:int((len(s)-1)/2)] == s[:int((len(s)-1)/2)][::-1] and s[int((len(s)+3)/2)-1:] == s[int((len(s)+3)/2)-1:][::-1] else "No")

s = input()

if s == s[::-1]:
    if s[:(len(s)-1)//2] == s[:(len(s)-1)//2][::-1]:
        if s[(len(s)+3)//2-1:] == s[(len(s)+3)//2-1:][::-1]:  # 奇数
            print('Yes')
            exit()
print('No')

n = int(input())
a = [int(input()) for i in range(n)]
 
if 0 in a:
    print(0)
else:
    ans = 1
    for i in range(n):
        if ans > 10**18 // a[i]:
            ans = -1
            break
        ans *= a[i]
    print(ans)

s = "abcdcba"

if s == s[::-1]:
    if s[:(len(s)-1)//2] == s[:(len(s)-1)//2][::-1] and s[(len(s)+3)//2-1:] == s[(len(s)+3)//2-1:][::-1]:
            print('Yes')
            exit()
print('No')
